system.base.Wet_db_cache

type
class
Caches DB queries. Primarily for external databases and really, *really* BUSY SQLite servers. right now, it's just a reserved class. TODO - it's practical (and perhaps even desirable) to cache MySQL queries in SQLite for speed - particularly when the DB server is on a remote machine elsewhere. it's even possible (if unlikely) to store SQLite queries in SQLite itself on the offchance that you have to do very slow queries.
